mapper.select: select p_attachment_no pAttachmentNo, p_original_file_name pOriginalFileName, p_save_file_name pSaveFileName, d_email dEmail, num from ProfileAttachment where d_email=#{dEmail} and num=#{num}
mapper.insert:
select profileattachment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into profileAttachment(p_attachment_no, p_original_file_name, p_save_file_name, d_email, num) values(#{pAttachmentNo},#{pOriginalFileName},#{pSaveFileName},#{dEmail},#{num})
mapper.update: update profileAttachment set p_original_file_name=#{pOriginalFileName},p_save_file_name=#{pSaveFileName} where d_email=#{dEmail} and num=#{num}
